DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim evaluate effect two innovative treatment strategy obese patient : high intensity interval training hypoxic conditioning . Obese patient randomize group perform high intensity interval training , constant load training , hypoxic conditioning placebo normoxic condition 8 week . The effect intervention measure regard exercise tolerance , blood pressure , body composition , metabolic status .
DOC.brief_title: High Intensity Interval Training Hypoxic Conditioning Obese Patients
DOC.detailed_description: 120 obese patient randomize 6 intervention group . Each group follow 8-week intervention ( 3 session per week ) either high intensity interval training normoxia hypoxia , constant load exercise training normoxia hypoxia , hypoxic normoxic ( placebo ) conditioning rest . Exercise capacity , metabolic status , blood pressure , vascular function physical activity assess intervention .
DOC.criteria: BMI 27 35 kg/mÂ² Physical activity < 2 hours/week No chronic disease treatment able interfere inflammation metabolic perturbatiosn associate obesity Diabetes mellitus treat insulin Autoimmune inflammatory disease require long term therapy Unstable dysthyroidism Bariatric surgery within past 18 month Tumoral , inflammatory , infectious , cardiac , respiratory , kidney , digestive disease Untreated sleep apnea
